We are working at the moment on moving this plugin from the whiteboard into the core plugins. Further all dispatcher related documents will be moved into the plugin as well. See Status of Themes: Skins and Dispatcher.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: This section will grow and show example usage of contracts in action - either standalone contracts or those that work in conjunction with plugins. Contributions Welcome.

section.title: Some examples to help you on your way
Enabling and adding the POD plugin
section.p: On this page you will see a link to a .pod version of this page. Below are the steps taken :-

ul.li: Add POD plugin to forrest.properties file

Add contract to include pod link - this can either be enabled in a master theme file (such as pelt.fv) or on a per folder basis (by altering a nested pelt.fv to point to modified *.panels.xml). In this case, we want a modified option to only alter files in this examples folder.
